title: Does it matter what usb-c to usb-a adapter you use when connect Pixel 4XL to car for Android Auto?
content:
My car has only usb-a ports, does it matter what brand of adapter I use to to plug Pixel 4XL into car to be able to use Android Auto?  The "help" section says use "appropriate cable" by which I am assuming it must be a usb-c pd, and I am using. The car sees the phone, but will not recognize Android Auto.
The Google C to A cable is out of stock, with no date as to when it will be
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
